data.title: Compliance and Document Collection with External Parties
data.text:
View Recording View Presentation

Distributing and collecting documents with external parties can be challenging, particularly as the number of documents and parties expands. The OOTB Request Files feature in OneDrive is fantastic for simple document collection from external parties, however it can be challenging to scale to a larger scenario. The same can apply to the OOTB external sharing features in SharePoint Online.

Here are some of the scenarios we’ll be discussing in this session:

Collecting monthly, quarterly, annual, and audit financial reporting from a large number of subsidiaries

Distributing and tracking emergency preparedness plans to first responders and municipalities across a large geographic area

Providing engineering drawing packages for customer review and approval, and providing the ability to upload change requests and modifications

Collecting insurance certifications and code of conduct attestations from suppliers

Challenges to scaling solutions like this are:

Providing dashboards to track compliance around both receipt and upload of documents according to a planned schedule

Email alert notifications

Approval workflows

Providing a simple user experience for external users who may not be familiar with Microsoft 365

Solutions we’ll review are:
